Patients exclude medical history mention orofacial trauma ( contusion fracture ) , systemic disorder ( e.g . rheumatoid arthritis , fibromyalgia ) , cervical disorder ( operationalized complaint , pain referral pattern pain provoked movement cervical spine ) , neurologic disorder ( e.g . trigeminal neuralgia , migraine tension type headache ) , drug alcohol abuse , use antidepressant hormonal medication .
